TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract SecurityAlgorithmSuite extends System.Object

summary.span: 指定演算法的屬性。

span.span: Specifies properties of algorithms.

summary.span: 這是 類別。

span.span: This is an class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個類別的執行個體是用來指定在保護訊息安全時所使用演算法的密碼編譯字元。Instances of this class are used to specify the cryptographic characteristics of the algorithms used when securing messages. 這個類別會由衍生類別 (Derived Class) 用來產生安全性演算法套件，而其中還包含描述安全性演算法的屬性。This class is used by derived classes to instantiate security algorithm suites, and contains properties that describe the security algorithms. 例如，`wsBasicHttp` 繫結會使用內部的衍生類別來指定其安全性演算法的屬性。For example, the `wsBasicHttp` binding uses an internal derived class to specify the properties of its security algorithms.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個類別的執行個體是由靜態屬性和唯讀屬性所組成，因此建構函式 (Constructor) 不會初始化任何屬性。The instances of this class consist of static properties and read-only properties, so the constructor does not initialize any properties.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly Property Basic128 As SecurityAlgorithmSuite

summary.span: 取得 Basic128 演算法套件。

span.span: Gets the Basic128 algorithm suite.

value.span: 128-bit Basic 。

span.span: The 128-bit Basic .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 根據預設，AES-128 使用做為加密演算法。By default, AES-128 is used as the encryption algorithm.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly Property Basic128Rsa15 As SecurityAlgorithmSuite

summary.span: 取得演算法套件，此套件會使用 RSA15 做為金鑰包裝演算法，而使用 128-bit Basic 做為訊息加密演算法。

span.span: Gets an algorithm suite that uses RSA15 as the key wrap algorithm and 128-bit Basic as the message encryption algorithm.

value.span: 演算法套件，此套件會使用 RSA15 做為金鑰包裝演算法，而使用 128-bit Basic 做為訊息加密演算法。

span.span: An algorithm suite that uses RSA15 as the key wrap algorithm and 128-bit Basic as the message encryption algorithm.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 傳回的 實際上是內部的子類別，而這個子類別會覆寫某些指定預設值的屬性以及某些方法。The returned is actually an internal subclass that overrides some of the properties specifying default values as well as some of the methods.

span.span: The default encryption key derivation length.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 傳回的值將會根據實作它的子類別而有所不同。The returned value will vary depending on the subclass that implements it. 若為 `Basic256` 加密，它會傳回 256。For `Basic256` encryption, it returns 256.

span.span: The key length to check.

summary.span: 指出非對稱演算法是否支援特定的金鑰長度。

span.span: Indicates whether a particular key length is supported by the asymmetric algorithm.

returns.span: 如果非對稱演算法支援這個金鑰長度，則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if the key length is supported by the asymmetric algorithm; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 一般金鑰長度為 128、192 和 256 個位元。Typical key lengths are 128, 192, and 256 bits.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `length` 會與某個範圍值 (根據不同的子類別而有不同) 進行比較。The `length` is compared to a range of values depending on the subclass. 例如，在 `TripleDES` 子類別中，這個方法會檢查 `length` 是否介於 192 和 256 (包含此二值) 之間。For example, in the `TripleDES` subclass, this method verifies that `length` is between 192 and 256, inclusive.
